name: SAUCON HILLS PARTNERS, INC. of Land Management Partners and Joann Gross and Janet Reidler t/a Keystone Country Realtors, Respondents v. Masaaki YAMAGUCHI, Petitioner
name_abbreviation: Saucon Hills Partners, Inc. v. Yamaguchi

parties: SAUCON HILLS PARTNERS, INC. of Land Management Partners and Joann Gross and Janet Reidler t/a Keystone Country Realtors, Respondents v. Masaaki YAMAGUCHI, Petitioner

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of February, 1991, this case is remanded to the Superior Court for consideration of the appeal on its merits.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
588 A.2d 1308
SAUCON HILLS PARTNERS, INC. of Land Management Partners and Joann Gross and Janet Reidler t/a Keystone Country Realtors, Respondents v. Masaaki YAMAGUCHI, Petitioner
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 19, 1991.
